scripts.vendor: npm install alpinejs htmx.org toastify-js lucide && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js static/vendor/htmx.min.js && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js static/vendor/alpine.min.js && cp node_modules/toastify-js/src/toastify.js static/vendor/toastify.js && cp node_modules/toastify-js/src/toastify.css static/vendor/toastify.css && cp node_modules/lucide/dist/umd/lucide.min.js static/vendor/lucide.min.js
